channel.title: EasyRSC connecting to other clients
channel.description:
I have EasyRSC and the server connects to the client correctly. I download an RSCD v25 client which looks identical to the original RSC client, however, when I run the server and login with the client, it says it is logging in for some time and then says there is an error connecting to the server. However, I can tell that the client can detect the server as if I try to login without running the server, it instantly gets the error. With the server running, it takes some time for the error to appear. I have had this following problem for a months and I think I should accept that I can't figure it out. If you could help, I would be greatful. I would need a fairly detailed tutorial.
Note: The client does not have settings.ini

item.title: EasyRSC connecting to other clients
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Crooks, post:2, topic:403788”]what about… Replace the EasyRSC PacketConstruction class into RSCD v25 client PacketConstruction?

Check after Config class in util folder - change the ip adress?
Also take a look at GameWindowMiddleMan or Mudclient class for the clientversion/port.[/quote]
This should fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: EasyRSC connecting to other clients
item.dc:creator: @Crooks Crooks
item.description:
@Crooks wrote:

what about… Replace the EasyRSC PacketConstruction class into RSCD v25 client PacketConstruction?

Check after Config class in util folder - change the ip adress?
Also take a look at GameWindowMiddleMan or Mudclient class for the clientversion/port.

Read full topic
